Write, Review, Test, Merge, Build, Deploy, Repeat.
Let's Treat Docs Like Code.

When you want to write more content, create accurate technical docs, iterate with collaborators, test drafts, merge, build, and deploy docs.

Docs Like Code

Let's find out the best practices and create a balance point between artisanal craft and automation efficiency.

About the book

We've transformed the way teams work together on docs, and we want to show you the best practices for writing docs using development tools and techniques.
